Text: RE Meeting Location Cc At this time the dates of March looks ok Greg Kardos Burlington Resources Original Message From Mathis Charles R mailtoCharles lPasocom Sent Monday January PM To Charles Goodding Chuck Thompson PNM Corina Veloz Darrell Schoolcraft David Campbell Francis Roemer Frank Gallegos Kardos Greg Jerry Graves Enron Johnny Hunt Lane Ayers Ron Matthews Stahl Danny Williams Steve Flaim Terry Hardman Cc Wilcox Bud Subject Meeting Location We have had an offer from Jerry Graves with Enron to host the meeting in Houston on March to include dinner the night of the th Possibly a nohost golf outing the afternoon of the th after the meeting Please let me know if this will work for you Offer alternate locations or dates if you dont like these Charles R Mathis Consultant Western Pipelines El Paso Corporation This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender
